resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
tianchen92 commented on pull request #4973: ARROW-6079: [Java] Implement/test UnionFixedSizeListWriter for FixedSizeListVector
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4973
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6079).
   
   Now we have two list vectors: ListVector and FixedSizeListVector.
   
   ListVector has already implemented UnionListWriter for writing data, however, FixedSizeListVector doesn't have this yet and seems the only way for users to write data is getting inner vector and set value manually.
   
   Implement a writer for FixedSizeListVector is useful in some cases.
   
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description:
Now we have two list vectors: {{ListVector}} and {{FixedSizeListVector}}.

{{ListVector}} has already implemented UnionListWriter for writing data, however, {{FixedSizeListVector}} doesn't have this yet and seems the only way for users to write data is getting inner vector and set value manually.

Implement a writer for {{FixedSizeListVector}} is useful in some cases.
